Any $A\subseteq \mathbb{N}$ of positive upper density contains a sumset $B+C$ where both $B$ and $C$ are infinite.



The Erd\H{os sumset conjecture}. Proved by Moreira, Richter, and Robertson \cite{MRR19}.

See also [656].




References


[MRR19] Moreira, Joel and Richter, Florian K. and Robertson, Donald, A proof of a sumset conjecture of Erd\H{o}s. Ann. of Math. (2) (2019), 605-652.
